Title: TYPO3 Cross-Site Scripting in Filelist Module
Description:
It has been discovered that the output table listing in the “Files” backend module is vulnerable to cross-site scripting when a file extension contains malicious sequences.

Access to the file system of the server - either directly or through synchronization - is required to exploit the vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.30, all versions starting from 9.0.0 before 9.5.12, all versions starting from 10.0.0 before 10.2.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.30 before 9.0.0, all versions starting from 9.5.12 before 10.0.0, all versions starting from 10.2.1
